summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Village Friends app new features. All backend APIs working 100%, frontend core features functional with new photo upload and group management features properly implemented.

ui_bugs.issue: User sessions expire quickly during testing, causing redirects to login page
ui_bugs.details: Sessions seem to have short expiration times which affects user experience during navigation between pages

passed_tests: Landing page loads with new kids playing together hero image
Muted color palette implemented correctly (sage green #5B9A8B, warm beige #F5F3EE, dark blue #2C3E50)
Color palette consistent across all pages (landing, register, login)
Registration flow works correctly with 14-day trial
User redirected to onboarding after successful registration
Settings page loads with profile photo upload functionality
Photo upload button found and accessible in Settings
Profile photo section properly implemented with base64 upload
Groups page accessible with premium feature banner
Premium upgrade prompts shown for group management features
Group creation requires premium subscription (403 error for free users)
Group member role management APIs working (promote/demote admins)
Join request approval/rejection for private groups working
All 19 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Photo upload API accepts base64 images and returns photo URL
Group management APIs properly check premium subscription status
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider increasing session timeout duration to improve user experience during navigation. The current short session expiration may cause users to be logged out frequently while using the app.
